channel.title: Life-Skills on Patrick S. Kelso
channel.description: Recent content in Life-Skills on Patrick S. Kelso

item.title: Advice for students
item.description: A collection of things I wish I’d known when I started my career. Mostly a list of books to read or activities to do.

item.title: Feedback to Intern Candidates
item.description: This is a modified version of feedback provided to unsuccessful applicants for a position as an Intern in my team at UTS
